content.query:
DROP VIEW IF EXISTS dbo.vw_history_historicalschemeaccount
GO

CREATE VIEW dbo.vw_history_historicalschemeaccount
AS
SELECT
   ext.instance_id   AS SAID,
   ext.change_type   AS ChangeType,
   ext.created       AS SACreated,

   js.Status,
   js.CreateDate,
   js.UpdateDate,
   js.JoinDate,
   js.LinkDate,
   js.IsDeleted
FROM [dbo].[ext_history_historicalschemeaccount] ext
OUTER APPLY OPENJSON (JSON_QUERY(body, '$'))
   WITH (
         [Status]       INT '$.status',
         [CreateDate]   VARCHAR(16) '$.created',
         [UpdateDate]   VARCHAR(16) '$.updated',
         [JoinDate]     VARCHAR(16) '$.created',
         [LinkDate]     VARCHAR(16) '$.created',
         [IsDeleted]    BIT '$.is_deleted'
         ) AS js
--WHERE vouchers <> '{}' and ext.id = 40000
--WHERE ext.[created] >= dateadd(day,datediff(day,1,GETDATE()),0)
--   AND ext.[created] < dateadd(day,datediff(day,0,GETDATE()),0)
